name: View an existing book
description:
In order to keep the bookstore accurate and up to date,
  as an authorized user I want to add, view, edit, and remove books.
descriptionHtml:
In order to keep the bookstore accurate and up to date,
as an authorized user I want to add, view, edit, and remove books.

steps.name: Given I have valid permissions to manage the bookstore
And I have some unique data of a book
Given a book exists in the bookstore

parameters.name: book
parameters.value: Book[id=1786221657, title=I Know Why the Caged Bird Sings, description=In reprehenderit rem., pageCount=1032, excerpt=Repellat sunt rerum accusantium omnis minus voluptatibus cum. Exercitationem rerum quaerat qui quisquam et beatae. Fugiat ullam assumenda aut magnam. Commodi ratione incidunt accusamus. Reiciendis enim officia cupiditate ipsum., publishDate=2025-09-21T04:10:45.716460848Z]

steps.name: When I open the details of that book
Then the details reflect the information provided when it was added
